scenes.title: Face Specialization Angle VR ~In-house flirtatious sex with a junior female employee who gives a great blowjob~!
scenes.synopsis: A face-specific angle x blowjob work! The short-cut “Enachi” has great destructive power! I am secretly dating Ena, a junior female employee. Ena has been trained in erotic techniques by me and loves to give blowjobs. When she gets frustrated at home or even at the office, she immediately hides and has sex with me! She kisses me so much that her lipstick rubs off, so I put on a new coat of lipstick, but then she kisses me again right away! “My lipstick rubbed off...Have my lips become kissable?” They intentionally miss the last train and get fucked in an empty office! “Senpai, we're here in the office...I feel like sucking your lips. I've grown very fond of licking you since you taught me how to do it. Just a little bit before everyone comes to work.” Now that everyone's gone home, I can do whatever I want. Thanks to all of you, KMP celebrates its 20th anniversary!
